description: Germany and France reintroduce strict measures amid dire warnings over rising Covid-19 cases.
title: Covid: Merkel warns of 'long, hard winter' as lockdowns return
title_page: Covid: Merkel warns of 'long, hard winter' as lockdowns return - BBC News
maintext: He later gave more details on what was permitted under the new rules, including going out for food shopping, going to work, going to a doctor or to a hospital or responding to a judicial or administrative summons. People are also allowed out for up to an hour for physical exercise or to take pets out - but only for a distance of 1km from their home.
